task_description: Convert Java loop structures to Python.
seed_question: Convert the Java for loop to Python: for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) { System.out.println(i); }

task_description: Translate Java conditional statements to Python.
seed_question: Convert the Java if-else statement to Python: if (number > 0) { System.out.println("Positive"); } else { System.out.println("Non-positive"); }

task_description: Translate Java method to Python function.
seed_question: Convert the Java method to Python function: public int add(int a, int b) { return a + b; }
seed_response:
def add(a, b):
    return a + b
